title: Strengthening Healthcare Practical Competencies: Gamification-Based Online Literacy Enhancement for Adults

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can decode daily documents (emails, reports, etc.) with 90% accuracy through gamification modules by accessing LMS three times weekly for 30 minutes over 16 weeks
Learners can apply 50 specialized legal/medical terms to work contexts through direct instruction-based video lectures
Learners achieve over 80% scores in weekly quizzes (formative assessments) while advancing stepwise literacy levels

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
